column1: So the legend goes, about 20 years ago, an ordinary man came to this city and suddenly became a mega-playboy.
column2: He was rich, smart, powerful, charismatic and had just about anything a woman would possibly want.
column3: The sweetheart of all women and the envy of all men.
column6: and some said he had moved to a man-made archipelago called Shambala in the Southern Pacific.
column7: After getting out of college, my friend Sao and I decided to come here to learn a bit more about this mega-playboy.
column8: Despite the fact that my mom kept bashing him till the day she passed away, this guy is my role model.
column9: According to our research he was a frequent visitor of this little mysterious shop before he left the city,
column10: so, we decided to follow his footsteps...
